    • Uses of Unit in Application

      Methods in Application that return Unit 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Unit Application.createUnit(boolean visibility, java.lang.String title)
      This method creates a unit in the application if the current user is the teacher
      Methods in Application that return types with arguments of type Unit 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Unit> Unit.getSubUnits()
      This method returns the subunits inside the unit
      java.util.List<Unit> Course.getUnits()
      This method returns the Units of a Course
      Methods in Application with parameters of type Unit 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Application.addNoteToUnit(Unit u, Note n)
      This method adds a note to a unit if the current user is the teacher
      void Application.addSubSectionToUnit(Unit u, Unit su)
      This method adds a subunit to a unit if the current user is the teacher
      void Course.addUnit(Unit u)
      This method adds a unit to a course
      void Application.addUnitToCourse(Unit u, Course c)
      This method adds a unit to a course if the current user is the teacher
      void Unit.createSubSection(Unit u)
      This method adds a subunit to the unit
      void Course.deleteUnit(Unit u)
      This method removes the unit from the course
      void Application.deleteUnit(Unit u)
      This method deletes a unit from the application if the current user is the teacher
